modName: A pair of cute followers and rich vendors Underworld inspired

descriptionHtml:
Name: A pair of cute followers-vendors Underworld inspired.
Version: 1.2
Date: 01/Feb/2013
Category: Companions Others
Required (only for Oblivion hair versions): Oblivion Hair Pack Fixed now with NPCEditor Support by DragonAge7
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22598/?
Recommended: Nexus Mod Manager
Author: eamico
Source: http://www.tesnexus.com

First of all, I apologize for my bad English.

Description
===========
This mod adds to the Skyrim Gameworld 2 female NPCS inspired to Underworld named Selene And Selenia; thay can be found in Whiterun, in the marketplace.
They both are also vendors and can be married.

Location
========
You can find them in Whiterun, and there they will come back when dismissed.


Details
=======
The look of these 2 NPC is taken from 2 beautiful savegames that I downloaded from nexus, the 2 savegames inspired to Underworld that I consider, according to my personal taste, more beautiful in confront of all others of the same type.

The first is "Breton Female lvl1 Selene - Kate Beckinsale Underworld Style "
by Venetica
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4932
All credit go to Venetica for the look of this NPC.

The second is "Kate B Underyim" by remy_martin
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2976
All credit go to remy_martin for the look of this NPC.

In vanilla versions I decided to keep vanilla hair and eyes in both faces. In this way, people will use them, having no mod dependency.

Oblivion hair versions require Oblivion Hair Pack Fixed now with NPCEditor Support by DragonAge7. I remember you that, if you will try to run the oblivion hair versions whithout Oblivion hair pack, your game will CTD.

They both are not only followers, having the capability to buy items also following the Dovakin, wherever he goes, up to 12000 gold pieces for each one. It is possible to sell them all items not interesting, having money and not ever being over encumbered. The first sells minerals, the second ingredients, including Daedra Hearts.

They both have their own Class, as well their own combat style, 2 special ebony swords and some arrows in their inventory. All these items will be useful to her and player, if liked.

In my system are installed these mods:

Aesthetic:


Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition -CBBE- by Caliente
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?

Bella's Better Females version 3:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=2812

No More Blocky Faces by Xenius
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=30

Natural Eyes by nevenbridge
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3589/?

Seductive Lips HD by EcthelionOtW
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22701/?
They should also work with a vanilla install of Skyrim, but the look will be different from the look of the screenshots.

Functional:

Amazing Follower Tweaks
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15524

It is important that it can be higher than my file in the load order. I keep it just under the last .esm.

If you don't have it, these NPC will accept to follow you only one at time.





Install
=======

I like very much Nexus Mod Manager, it is perfect for me. I suggest to use it, but....your choice.

Pick which method you are going to use for installation:

Nexus Mod Manager Installation
- = or = -
Manual installation

Nexus Mod Manager installation:
Download the file with Nexus Mod Manager. Activate it. Done.

Manual Installation:
Place the zip file's contents into your Skyrim/data folder to install and be sure to activate the ESP and ESM files in your Data Files listing.

NMM downloading problem.
I have seen that in early hours after uploading a file, NMM can not give the possibility to download new files using the button "download with manager". An error message says that file do not exist. After one or two hours, the problem is automatically solved. I don't know why this happens, maybe it is related to high traffic that Nexus server is forced to tolerate.

In this case, you can follow these instructions:
1) Download the file manually.
2) Open NMM.
3) Hit the black arrow located in the left high button and choose " Add Mod from file".
4) Locate and select the file that you have downloaded manually.
5) Hit "open" button.
6) From Mod's list, select the created file and activate it. Done.


Uninstall
=========
Pick which method you are going to use for uninstall based on how you installed it:

Nexus Mod Manager Uninstall
- = or = -
Manual Uninstall

Nexus Mod Manager Uninstall
Open Nexus mod Manager and deactivate the file EASeleneMerFolNE. Done.


Manual Uninstall

Remove the zip file's contents from your Skyrim/data folder to uninstall and be sure to deactivate the ESP and ESM files in your Data Files listing.
----------------


Upgrade
=======
Upgrading from a previous version can make you loose all the equipment that you have give to them, so it is better to
take all their things and dismiss them first, then uninstall the previous version and then install the newer.



Incompatibility
===============
None known.

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
If you decide to marry one of them, it is better to tell her where she can live with you BEFORE she leaves the temple in Riften.

History
=======
01/Feb/2013 Version 1.0 is the initial version of this file.
31/Dic/2013 Version 1.1: corrected a bug in the merchant money.
01/Jan/2014 Version 1.2: corrected an ulterior bug in the Selenia's money.
03/Jan/2014 Oblivion hair Version 1.2: added 2 different hairstyles from Oblivion hair.
04/Jan/2014 Oblivion hair Version 1.2(2): added a single hairstyle to both from Oblivion hair.


Contact
=======
You can find me on TESNexus as eamico
You can send me an email here: eamico@tiscali.it

Thanks to God for creating us all.

Tools Used
==========

Licensing/Legal
===============

doesn't work or your PC blows up.
